LanguageData.Messtin.label: Messtin
LanguageData.Messtin.description: It is used for cooking rice and simple cooking. Cooking speed is reduced by 30%, because there is only a minimum of equipment.
LanguageData.Messtin_Blueprint.label: Messtin (blueprint)
LanguageData.Messtin_Blueprint_Install.label: Messtin (blueprint)
LanguageData.Messtin_Frame.label: Messtin (building)
LanguageData.Messtin_Frame.description: It is used for cooking rice and simple cooking. Cooking speed is reduced by 30%, because there is only a minimum of equipment.
LanguageData.IronPot.label: Iron pot
LanguageData.IronPot.description: A convenient cooking table when cooking rice or making soup.
LanguageData.IronPot_Blueprint.label: Iron pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.IronPot_Blueprint_Install.label: Iron pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.IronPot_Frame.label: Iron pot (building)
LanguageData.IronPot_Frame.description: A convenient cooking table when cooking rice or making soup.
LanguageData.RiceCooker.label: Rice cooker
LanguageData.RiceCooker.description: A convenient cooking table when cooking rice or making soup. Because it already has the latest cookware cooking speed is increased 30%.
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Blueprint.label: Rice cooker (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Blueprint_Install.label: Rice cooker (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Frame.label: Rice cooker (building)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Frame.description: A convenient cooking table when cooking rice or making soup. Because it already has the latest cookware cooking speed is increased 30%.
LanguageData.ZPIrori.label: 囲炉裏
LanguageData.ZPIrori.description: 日本家屋に設けられる炉の一種で、床の一部を四角に切り抜いて火をたく場所。主に暖房と調理が目的だが人々の集いの場所でもありリラクゼーションをもたらしてくれる。
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Blueprint.label: 囲炉裏 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Blueprint_Install.label: 囲炉裏 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Frame.label: 囲炉裏 (building)
LanguageData.ZPIrori_Frame.description: 日本家屋に設けられる炉の一種で、床の一部を四角に切り抜いて火をたく場所。主に暖房と調理が目的だが人々の集いの場所でもありリラクゼーションをもたらしてくれる。

LanguageData.PestleAndMortar.label: Kineusu
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar.description: Kine(Pestle) and Usu(mortar) for making mochi. You can make mochi in large quantities.

LanguageData.Nukadoko.label: Nukadoko
LanguageData.Nukadoko.description: A large bottle that can make a large amount of Nukaduke(rice bran pickles) that are preserved foods.
